text: Amid her parents nasty custody battle, Kate Gosselin ’ s daughter Hannah has shut down her popular, very active Instagram account, RadarOnline. com can exclusively report. When the 14 - year - old sextuplet started living with her father Jon this spring, separate from her mother and seven siblings, she started her own account, and posted photos with her friends and father. In May, Jon advertised his teen daughter ’ s page, and told his own followers to “ check it out. ” Even just two weeks ago, she held an Instagram live from a friend ’ s bedroom, where the two discussed ordering pizza for dinner. But now, the page has disappeared — could Kate have had anything to do with it? Kate has never allowed her kids to have their own social media pages, and
